metadata.title: CVE-2017-14634 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
In libsndfile 1.0.28, a divide-by-zero error exists in the functiondouble64_init() in double64.c, which may lead to DoS when playing a craftedaudio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14634` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.2
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.2').
